price: To Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and earth, and Allah is All-Mighty, All-Wise.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
